data.name: RAMS Line Of Credit
data.description: Whether due to extra repayments or a capital gain, chances are some equity may have built up in your home over time.   Accessing this equity, to have a transactional facility with a set credit limit, secured by a property, is what a line of credit home loan can offer, subject to being able to service the loan. With an approved limit in place, you can access those funds for any investment purposes.

features.additionalInfo: Interest charged only on the outstanding loan balance
25 free transaction per month across all access methods:  ATM/EFTPOS & cheque access.  After free transactions:  $2.00 for ATM, $0.65 for EFTPOS and $0.90 for cheques
To access the site, you simply need to register by calling 13 7267

eligibility.additionalValue: Those with an Australian permanent residency and who are currently in Australia
Applicant/s can be personal customers, company customers or family trusts.
eligibility.additionalInfo: Applicant/s can be personal customers, company customers or family trusts.
Application Fee Waived off with Value Advantage Package

fees.name: Subsequent Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each subsequent valuation required on security property

fees.name: Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee covers costs in arranging for our Panel Solicitor to attend Settlement with you and your Conveyancer or Solicitor

fees.name: Additional Bank Cheque Charge
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever more than 2 bank cheques are required to advance any part of your loan amount on the settlement date.

fees.name: Bank Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a bank cheque after settlement

fees.name: Bank Cheque Fee - Repurchase
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request RAMS to re-purchase an issued bank cheque.

fees.name: Bank Cheque Fee - Replacement
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a replacement bank cheque

fees.name: Cheque Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever you send us a cheque for deposit into your loan account

fees.name: Dishonour Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a payment to RAMS under your Direct Debit Authority is dishonoured or when we dishonour a direct debit presented on your account

fees.name: Dishonour Fees for a cheque deposited to your account
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a cheque payment to us is dishonoured. This is when a cheque you deposit is dishonoured by the issuing bank

fees.name: Dishonour Fees for a cheque presented against your account
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we dishonour a cheque presented on your account

fees.name: Australia Post cheque dishonour Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever a cheque you deposit at any branch of Australia Post is dishonoured

fees.name: Default Notice Fee - 14 days
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever the 14 day default notice is issued

fees.name: 30 days in Arrears Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever your loan is 30 days in arrears

fees.name: 60 days in Arrears Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever your loan is 60 days in arrears

fees.name: 90 days in Arrears Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever your loan is 90 days in arrears

fees.name: Payment Deferment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever we agree to defer the scheduled date for a repayment before the repayment date

fees.name: Duplicate Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever we supply you with a copy of a statement previously issued to you, or an interim statement outside the normal statement cycle

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Payable per loan account plus legal and other costs incurred by us if you ask us and we agree to discharge any mortgage or loan account in connection with your loan agreement. Legal & other
associated costs incurred by us are paid separately.

fees.name: Lender's Mortgage Insurance premium
fees.additionalInfo: Lender?s Mortgage Insurance is required on loans under the following circumstances - Up to $1.5M when the LVR is over 80%, from $1.5M up to $3.5M when LVR is over 70%, more than $3.5M when LVR is over 60%

fees.name: Guarantee Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when guarantee documents are required to be prepared

fees.name: Trust Deed review
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a Trust deed is required to be reviewed

fees.name: Company search fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a company search is required

fees.name: Company documentation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when documentation is prepared for a company borrower

fees.name: Old System Title
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when an Old System Title is required for security.

fees.name: Stamp Duty Refund
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a stamp duty refund is requested on your behalf

fees.name: Unlimited DE's per month
fees.additionalInfo: When a direct entry transaction is processed on your loan

fees.name: EFT Cash Withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: When you make an EFT cash withdrawal (exceeding the number of free transactions allowed)

fees.name: EFT Purchase or Cash Out
fees.additionalInfo: When you make an EFT purchase or cash withdrawal (exceeding the number of free transactions allowed)

fees.name: ATM Cash Withdrawal or Balance enquiry
fees.additionalInfo: When you make an ATM withdrawal or balance enquiry in Australia (exceeding the number of free transactions allowed). Some Institutions may charge a fee for use of their ATMs. Payable in addition to fee for transactions over free threshold.

fees.name: Debit Card - new issue
fees.additionalInfo: When you are issued with your first Access Card

fees.name: Debit Card - renewal
fees.additionalInfo: When your Access Card is renewed

fees.name: Debit Card - lost / stolen issue
fees.additionalInfo: When your Access Card is lost / stolen and re-issued

fees.name: Debit Card - replacement
fees.additionalInfo: When you request an additional Access Card or when we issue you a replacement or additional card, at your request

fees.name: Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on each cheque debited to your account (exceeding the number of free transactions allowed for transaction product loans)

fees.name: Cheque Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you send a cheque deposit to RAMS

fees.name: Stop Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request us to stop payment on a cheque you have written

fees.name: Copy Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you ask for a copy of a presented cheque you have written

fees.name: Special Answer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a special answer on a cheque deposited with us

fees.name: Cheque Book - new issue
fees.additionalInfo: When you are issued with your first cheque book

fees.name: Cheque book - replacement
fees.additionalInfo: When you are issued with a replacement cheque book

fees.name: Cheque book - subsequent issue
fees.additionalInfo: When you are re-issued with a subsequent cheque book

fees.name: Australia Post Cash & Cheque Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for cash & cheque deposits at Australia Post

fees.name: Australia Post further Cheque Deposit Fee multiple (per cheque)
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you deposit a 2nd or subsequent cheque at Australia Post

fees.name: Australia Post Cash Withdrawal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you withdraw cash at Australia Post branches

fees.name: Consent Fee Portability
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a Portability transaction be performed. The third party costs to be paid separately.

fees.name: Term Extension Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a term extension. The third party costs to be paid separately.

fees.name: Facility Merge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request loan accounts to be merged. The third party costs to be paid separately.

fees.name: Loan Splitting Fee (post settlement)
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request to split your loan after settlement. The third party costs to be paid separately.

fees.name: Consent Fee Second Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request consent to a 2nd mortgage. The third party costs to be paid separately.

fees.name: Consent Fee Subdivision
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request to subdivide any security. The third party costs to be paid separately.

fees.name: Consent Fee Release of Borrower
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request to release a borrower. The third party costs to be paid separately.

fees.name: Top up / Loan increase fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a loan increase. The third party costs to be paid separately.

fees.name: Consent Fee Title Production
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request to produce the Title. The third party costs to be paid separately.

fees.name: Consent Fee Partial Release of Security
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a release of any security. The third party costs to be paid separately.

fees.name: Loan Conversion Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you convert from one RAMS product to another.

fees.name: Additional Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we require a valuation of the security at any time

fees.name: Interest Only Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you change your repayment type from principal and interest to interest only, or extend your interest only period.

fees.name: Progress Payment Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if any drawdown under the loan is used to make a progress payment to the builder

fees.name: Final Progress Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when your construction is complete

fees.name: Redraw Fees
fees.additionalInfo: No minimum

fees.name: Account Keeping Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $20.00 per month without Value Advantage Package.  Annual service fee $375.00 with Value Advantage Package option

eligibility.additionalInfo: Account Keeping Fee Waived off with Value Advantage Package

fees.name: Annual Service Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This feature is optional. This fee is only applicable if you opt in for Value Advantage Package

lendingRates.additionalInfo: When the loan purpose is Owner Occupied and any loan amount.  Maximum loan size is $1,000,000.00
When the loan purpose is Investment.  Maximum loan size is $1,000,000.00

lendingRates.additionalValue: Total consumer borrowing $150,000.00 or more with Value Advantage Package option
lendingRates.additionalInfo: When the loan purpose is Owner Occupied.  Maximum loan size is $1,000,000.00

lendingRates.additionalValue: Total consumer borrowing $150,000.00 or more with Value Advantage Package option
lendingRates.additionalInfo: When the loan purpose is Investment.  Maximum loan size is $1,000,000.00
